name: Heist Means Heist
description:
Modern politics can be confusing - particularly when in the middle of a political crisis!

This brief introduction to British politics teaches you everything you need to know about the goings-on in the Houses of Parliament. Even the most studious Breskit scholar might learn a thing or two here!

Expected playtime: 3 minutes

Sound recommended, though not required (You should use it if you can, though)

Credits:
* Game by Petter Vilberg - @pettervil
* Sound and Music by Thomas Skuggevik
* Art by GDevelop "Platformer example project" 
* Based on an idea by Victor and Gary (ideas guys) * Additional art from Wikimedia Commons and Petter
* Additional music from Wikimedia Commons, by the United States Navy Band
* Headlines by Australian Broadcasting Corporation and Evening Standard
